title: Road Closure: Meridian St. at 34th St.
description: Meridian Street is closed between 34th and 35th due to water main repairs. Expect delays until 5:00 PM.

title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning
description: A severe thunderstorm warning is in effect for Indianapolis until 6:00 PM. Stay indoors and avoid flooding areas.

title: Community Watch Meeting Tonight
description: The Eastside Neighborhood Watch meets at 7:00 PM in the Community Center (123 Main St.). All are welcome.

title: Heat Advisory
description: High temperatures (95Â°F+) expected through Thursday evening. Remember to stay hydrated and check on neighbors.
